        private static void playerPlay(Deck deck,
                               java.util.List<Card> hand,
                               Player player,
                               java.util.Scanner sc,
                               int bet,
                               java.util.List<Card> dealerHand)
        This method handles the Player playing
        Parameters:
        deck - The deck of cards
        player - the Player or participant
        sc - the scanner object
        hand - the player's hand, used to calculate points.
        bet - the size of the bet that is being wagered.
        dealerHand - the hand of the Dealer. Needed because if the player's starting hand is valid

      • dealerPlay

        private static void dealerPlay(Deck deck,
                               java.util.List<Card> hand,
                               Dealer dealer,
                               Player player,
                               int bet)
        This method handles the dealer playing - J's are worth 11, Q's are worth 12, K's are worth 13, A's are worth 1
        Parameters:
        deck - The deck of cards
        player - the Player or participant
        hand - hand belonging to the Dealer.
        dealer - The dealer who is playing
        bet - the size of the bet that is being wagered.

      • calculateHandTotal

        private static int calculateHandTotal(java.util.List<Card> hand,
                                      Player player)
        This method handles calculating the points that a player has Note: - J's are worth 11, Q's are worth 12, K's are worth 13, A's are worth 1
        Parameters:
        hand - The listArray of cards that a Player/Dealer has
        player - the Player or participant
        Returns:
        The number of points that a player has.

        private static void startPlaying(Deck deck,
                                 java.util.List<Card> hand,

      • playRound

        private static void playRound(Deck deck,
                              java.util.List<Card> hand,
                              Player player,
                              int numberOfCardsToDeal)
        This method handles a round of cards. a card is dealt, the new hand total is calculated, and the points are set to the player.
        Parameters:
        deck - The deck of cards
        hand - The ListArray of Cards that a player has
        player - The player who is betting against the dealer.
        numberOfCardsToDeal - 2 cards are dealt to the Player at the start of the game, 1 card when the player wants to hit

      • decideWhoWins

        private static void decideWhoWins(Dealer dealer,
                                  Player player,
                                  int bet)
        This method handles the end game. If both players are tied, the dealer wins. Whoever has more points wins.
        Parameters:
        dealer - The Dealer
        player - the Player or participant
        bet - the size of the bet that is being wagered.

      • getMoney

        private static void getMoney(java.util.Scanner sc,
                             Player p1)
        This method handles setting the bankroll. Note: cannot enter an invalid amount or a char.
        Parameters:
        sc - the scanner object needed for inputs
        p1 - the player 1

      • describeHand

        private static void describeHand(java.util.List<Card> hand,
                                 java.lang.String player,
                                 java.lang.String option)
        Used when describing dealer hand. Only going to describe faceup cards when it's dealers turn. When it's player's turn, only one card will be described in full.
        Parameters:
        hand - The hand that is going to be described
        player - the stringified name of Player or Dealer
        option - only going to reveal card when option is set to 'show'
